text: Constant Lestienne was the defending champion but retired in the first round against Simone Bolelli. Stefano Travaglia won the title after defeating Marco Cecchinato 6–2, 3–6, 6–4 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Prosperita Open - Singles 2017 Singles
title: 2017 Prosperita Open – Singles
